meanings.sent1: The unbreeched boy wore shorts instead of long pants.

meanings.sent3: The unbreeched toddler looked adorable in his tiny overalls.
meanings.sent4: The unbreeched man felt a sense of freedom without the constricting pants.
meanings.sent5: The image of the unbreeched cowboy riding into the sunset was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The unbreeched baby giggled as he crawled around in his diaper.

meanings.sent5: The unbreeched puppy wagged its tail happily in the grass.

meanings.sent1: The unbreeched man had to quickly find some pants to wear.
